name: C# Runner
description:
This is a project for a Unity course that we did. You gonna play as C# Runner, a poor sprite that have to run to survive.

Controls: Move with WASD or the arrow keys, and jump with the spacebar.

Project members:

Carlos Gómez Botía - Artist and animator

Óscar David Caparrós Gomez - Menu designer

Antonio Carrión Nieto - Menu designer

José Antonio Gómez Conesa - Programmer

Andrés Ruiz Orzáez - Game Designer

Alejandro Milán García - Audio
